thread.section_title: Nevada Corporate Headquarters, Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Nevada Corporate Headquarters, Inc. | nchinc.com
thread.title: Jacob Boos
thread.title_full: Nevada Corporate Headquarters, Inc. reviewed by Jacob Boos

author: Jacob Boos
title: Jacob Boos
text:
I've spoken to a number of NCH representatives over the last two years. This past week I dealt with Darren Rasmussen and just like every experience before it went exceptionally well. Darren specifically was very quick to respond even when I'd call and he was on the other line he'd send me an email saying he's on the phone but if I needed something quickly I could respond via email. This to me was a huge sign of the level of respect he puts on his customers, that our needs were just as urgent to him as they are to us.
Thanks for going above and beyond Darren I look forward to working with you in the future!
